settings.name: Hash
settings.description: Memory allocated for transposition table (MB).

settings.name: Threads
settings.description: Number of CPU threads to use.

settings.name: UCT_Threads
settings.description: Threads per GPU for Monte Carlo Tree Search.

settings.name: DNN_Batch_Size
settings.description: Neural network batch size (higher = better GPU utilization).

settings.name: MultiPV
settings.description: Number of best lines to calculate.

settings.name: USI_Ponder
settings.description: Think during opponent's turn.

settings.name: MinimumThinkingTime
settings.description: Minimum time to think per move (milliseconds).

settings.name: SlowMover
settings.description: Time management strategy.

settings.name: NetworkDelay
settings.description: GPU inference delay compensation (milliseconds).

settings.name: NetworkDelay2
settings.description: Additional network delay (milliseconds).

settings.name: USI_OwnBook
settings.description: Enable opening book usage.

settings.name: BookFile
settings.description: Opening book database file.

settings.name: BookMoves
settings.description: Number of moves to use book for.

settings.name: BookDepthLimit
settings.description: Maximum ply depth to use book.

settings.name: BookIgnoreRate
settings.description: Percentage chance to ignore book move (0=always use).

settings.name: EvalDir
settings.description: Directory containing neural network files.

settings.name: Eval_Coef
settings.description: Evaluation scaling coefficient.

settings.name: UCT_NodeLimit
settings.description: Maximum MCTS search nodes (1 node â‰ˆ 2KB RAM).

settings.name: C_init
settings.description: MCTS exploration parameter (initial).

settings.name: C_base
settings.description: MCTS exploration base parameter.

settings.name: C_init_root
settings.description: MCTS exploration parameter for root node.

settings.name: C_base_root
settings.description: MCTS base parameter for root node.
